title: Samsung’s on a roll, brings One UI 4.1 to the Galaxy Note 20 and Galaxy S21 FE
content:
Samsung is in no mood to slow down its One UI 4.1 rollout. The company has already brought the latest iteration of its custom Android skin to a range of Galaxy devices, including the Galaxy Z Flip 3, Galaxy Z Fold 3, and the Galaxy S21. Now, two more devices are joining the ranks, as

The post Samsung’s on a roll, brings One UI 4.1 to the Galaxy Note 20 and Galaxy S21 FE appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has begun rolling out the One UI 4.1 update to the Galaxy Note 20 and the Galaxy S21 FE in select markets. Read on!
